#Text= Raava says : " Korra , this fight is not over .

column1: #Text=" Korra says : " Raava .
#Text=" Raava says : " Vaatu can not win .
#Text=Do not give in to ten thousand years of darkness .
#Text=You are the Avatar .
#Text=" Korra says : " You can not win .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " Jinora !
#Text=Jinora !
#Text=" Bumi says : " Wait a second .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " What , do you hear something ?
#Text=" Bumi says : " Yes .
#Text=They 're all around us .
#Text=The cannibals , they 're everywhere .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " Bumi , you must focus your mind .
#Text=Right now !
#Text=There are no cannibals .
#Text=" Bumi says : " Yes , there are !
#Text=They 're gon na eat every last one of us !
#Text=" Kya says : " Who are you two ?
#Text=" Tenzin says : " Kya , we 're your brothers .
#Text=You must remember , before the fog infects you .
#Text=" Kya says : " No , you 're just a vision .
#Text=I have no family .
#Text=You ca n't tie me down .
#Text=" Bumi says : " They 're closing in !
#Text=I got ta get out of here !
#Text=" Tenzin says : " No !
#Text=Bumi !
#Text=Kya !
#Text=Come back !
#Text=" Mako says : " Please , let us out .
#Text=" Desna says : " His grovelling is pathetic .
#Text=" Eska says : " But I do enjoy the sweet scent of desperation .
#Text=" Mako says : " Come on , your dad has become an evil monster .
#Text=He 's gon na bring on eternal darkness .
#Text=Why would you protect someone who does n't care about you at all ?
#Text=" Desna says : " Father was going to let me expire when we tried to open the northern portal .
#Text=Perhaps we should rethink our position .
#Text=" Mako says : " Yes !
#Text=" Eska says : " No .
#Text=Do n't listen to him .
#Text=His words are poisoning your mind .
#Text=What 's with this outburst of emotion ?
#Text=" Bolin says : " I 'm sorry , I ca n't help it .
#Text=It 's just so sad that I 'll never be with you again .
#Text=" Eska says : " What ?
#Text=Explain yourself further .
#Text=" Bolin says : " Eska , I 've always loved you .
#Text=And I always wanted to be with you .
#Text=But now that the world is ending , I 'm never gon na get that chance .
#Text=" Eska says : " We could have been together , but you left me at the altar .
#Text=" Bolin says : " No , I was scared .
#Text=I was scared of my true feelings for you .
#Text=Gah , I should have never left you .
#Text=I 'm sorry .
#Text=And I 'm sorry that we 'll never have the chance to rekindle the dying ember that was our love into a big fire of love flames .
#Text=" Eska says : " You 'll never defeat my father .
#Text=But , should you survive , perhaps we could spend eternal darkness together .
#Text=" Mako says : " Wow !
#Text=That was the best acting I 've ever seen .
#Text=You completely fooled her .
#Text=" Bolin says : " Yeah right , huh .
#Text=That was acting .
#Text=" Desna says : " They will certainly perish .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " You must stay focused .
#Text=Remember who you are Tenzin .
#Text=You are the son of Avatar Aang .
#Text=You are the hope for future generations of airbenders .
#Text=The fate of the world rests on your shoulders .
#Text=But what if I fail ?
#Text=Then your father 's hopes of the future dies with you .
#Text=I ca n't fail .
#Text=You will .
#Text=Ah , stop it !
#Text=I am the son of Avatar Aang .
#Text=I am the hope for future generations of airbenders .
#Text=I am the son of Avatar Aang .
#Text=" Aang 's image says : " Hello , my son .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " Dad , I 've failed you .
#Text=I am no spiritual leader , and I 've let the world down .
#Text=I 'll never be the man you were .
#Text=" Aang 's image says : " You are right .
#Text=You are trying to hold on to a false perception of yourself .
#Text=You are not me and you should not be me .
#Text=You are Tenzin .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " I am not a reflection of my father .
#Text=I am Tenzin .
#Text=I am Tenzin !
#Text=" Tenzin says : " Jinora !
#Text=" Bumi says : " Huh ?
#Text=What happened ?
#Text=" Kya says : " I think our brother saved us .
#Text=" Jinora says : " Dad .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " You 'll be okay sweetie .
#Text=I 'm here .
#Text=" Jinora says : " What happened ?
#Text=The last thing I remembered was dark spirits taking me away .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " You were trapped in the Fog of Lost Souls .
#Text=And I was n't going to let you stay there .
#Text=" Jinora says : " I 'm so happy to see you , Dad .
#Text=" Mako and Bolin says : " Korra !
#Text=" Bolin says : " He 's got the Light Spirit !
#Text=" Jinora says : " The world is in trouble .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " What are you talking about ?
#Text=How do you know ?
#Text=" Jinora says : " I can feel it .
#Text=" Bumi says : " What happened ?
#Text=" Jinora says : " It 's Korra .
#Text=This light spirit will guide you out of the Spirit World .
#Text=I have to go help .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " Jinora , wait !
#Text=" Unavaatu says : " Now , ten thousand years of darkness begins !
#Text="
